thread.title: WATCH: Trea Turner Makes Insane Diving Catch, Throw
thread.title_full: WATCH: Trea Turner Makes Insane Diving Catch, Throw

title: WATCH: Trea Turner Makes Insane Diving Catch, Throw
text:
— Jamal Collier (@JamalCollier) March 28, 2017 Trea Turner. Shortstop. 
— Dan Kolko (@masnKolko) March 28, 2017 
Which is more impressive: the diving catch or the laser throw? 
(Answer: yes.) 
Race Trea Turner, Win Nats Tickets 
And it’s not as though Turner is a one-highlight kind of player. Here’s another one of his stellar defensive highlights from Spring Training. Big League range & athleticism displayed by Trea Turner. Find some time at practice to work on web gems. Never know when you might need one. pic.twitter.com/7U7Yqwe5r2 
— Matt Antonelli ⚾️AB (@MattAntonelli9) March 28, 2017 
The Nationals certainly appear to have found themselves a steal in Turner. But that was readily apparent long before Turner even proved himself a capable — to say the least — shortstop.
